issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

fields.description: Both pickers and tabbed-bars do not work in ListViews on Android but work fine on iOS. This is one of the major parity issues we notice between iOS and Android.
fields.summary: Android: TabbedBar and Picker does not work in ListView (parity)
